text: Ezɨ Godɨn apangkuvir a pura anɨngizim, an Adam amizir arazir kuramɨn mɨn amir puvatɨ. Guizbangɨra, gumazir vamɨra Adam arazir kuram gamima, ezɨ tuavir kamɨn gumazir avɨriba ariaghɨre. Ezɨ gumazir vamɨra Krais Iesus an apangkuvimɨn, God e gamizɨ, e an damazimɨn dera. Ezɨ Godɨn apangkuvimɨn gavgavim bar ovevemɨn gavgavim gafira. Bizir kam, a gumazamizir avɨriba pura me ganɨngizɨ, a me gizɨfa!
